tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  vr_experience_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    vr_experience_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vr_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    platform TEXT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE UserFeedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    experience_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_feedback(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES vr_experiences(experience_id)
);
